title: How has stocks for Amazon changed over the past year? - Quora
tags: Cultural Differences Between New York City and San Francisco

response.answer_text: Amazon stock has generally increased in value over the year. You can see much more detail and info if you look at Amazon stock data. There will be more for you to analyze besides just stock price. It is easy to see how Amazon has changed when looking at its data. Using Stock Price Data from Intrinio, you can pull certain parameters depending on what you’re looking to see. For example, make your identifier Amazon, pick a start and end date and search for data by price, marketcap, volume etc.  Hope this information is useful for you! Full disclosure: I work for Intrinio.
